==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|sort=きりしあ'}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|pt|ja|sort=きりしあ'}} {{m|pt|Grécia}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

The spelling is an example of [[ateji]], borrowed from {{etyl|zh|ja|sort=きりしあ'}} {{m|zh|希臘}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|ギリシア}}

===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|proper|ギリシア}}

# {{rare spelling of|ギリシア|lang=ja|sort=きりしあ'}}

====Usage notes====
The kanji spelling is rare. The first character as an abbreviation ({{m|ja|希}}) is more common than the full kanji spelling.
